backend/main.mo: Actor storing contact messages with timestamp-based IDs and providing submit and query functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two features, associated components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing each frontend fileâ€™s purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading the React app and setting meta tags for SEO and social previews.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling hash routing and rendering pages with persistent header and footer.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: Contact form component with validation, submission via mutation, and success/error alerts.
frontend/src/components/download/ComingS: Card displaying Android icon, Play Store coming-soon message, notify button, and release info.
frontend/src/components/features/Feature: Grid of feature cards with icons and descriptions, animated via scroll reveal.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryP: Screenshot and video placeholder grids using reveal animations and static placeholder images.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Parallax hero section with title, tagline, call-to-action button, and developer info.
frontend/src/components/site/Footer.tsx: Footer showing logo, social links, and credits with neon-styled accents.
frontend/src/components/site/Header.tsx: Responsive header with logo, navigation links, and mobile sheet menu using hash routing.
Wrapper around Button that adds neon-button styling.
frontend/src/components/site/NeonCard.ts: Reusable neon-styled card component with optional hover effects.
Layout wrapper applying a site-layout container style.
frontend/src/components/worldmap/WorldMa: Interactive grid of world locations that highlights cards and reveals descriptions on hover or click.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for managing Internet Identity authentication and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: Hook that returns a scroll-based offset value for parallax effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines mutation for submitting contact forms via the backend actor and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealOnScroll.ts: Hook using IntersectionObserver to mark an element visible when scrolled into view.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles with neon theme variables and component classes for buttons, cards, and gradients.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, query client, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutGamePage.tsx: Renders an About page with scroll-reveal sections describing the Axses game and feature highlight cards.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays a contact form with social links and response-time info using a reveal-on-scroll animation.
frontend/src/pages/DownloadPage.tsx: Shows a coming-soon download card and lists minimum and recommended system requirements.
frontend/src/pages/FeaturesPage.tsx: Presents a features overview page containing a header and a collection of feature cards.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Provides a gallery page framework with placeholder image components.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Defines the homepage with a hero section and animated feature cards introducing game highlights.
frontend/src/pages/WorldMapPage.tsx: Displays the world map image with reveal animation and an interactive map component.
frontend/src/router/routes.ts: Defines the application's client-side route list mapping paths to page components.
frontend/src/router/useHashRouter.ts: Implements a simple hash-based router hook with state updates on hash changes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, themes, typography, container settings, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, image requirements, and tracked feature requests for background updates.
